brandi gala thawath kilomitara dekak pamana gamankala pasu apata mariyathumiyage piliruwak sahitha handiyakata paminiya haki wiya.ee aasannaye niwasakin para asu wita ehi siti wathu kamkaruwek ithama oonakamin apata upakara kirimata idiripath wiya.ohu samaga kathabaha karana wita apata watahune kandata yamata wada apa sathuwa bimata athi de pilibanda ohuge unanduwa wadi bawayi.ee mohothe apa sathuwa mathpan bindak ho thibuni nam ohu apawa kandu mudunata osawagena yanab bawa noanumanaya.kese wethath ohuge bala kirimata asala kadayakin kapuru saha suwanda kuru milatagena kowile yamata siduwiya.eyinuth nonawathuna ohu apata ithiri kapuru aadiya kande tharamak ihala athi wandanamana karana sthanayakata puja kalayuthu bawa kiyasitiyeya.ewita dewiyange aashirwadayen yahathin kandu tharanaya kalahaki bawa pawasuweya.apata dewa karunawa kesewethath pradeshawasinge karunawa awashya nisa api ema upades sawadanawa asa sitiyemu.
